snippet: On the latest edition of TimesCast Tech Reddit's founder shares his inspiration and mistakes; the Minitel, France's precursor to the Internet, goes silent and Sam Grobart offers five tips for buying a laptop.
abstract: On the latest edition of TimesCast Tech Reddit's founder shares his inspiration and mistakes; the Minitel, France's precursor to the Internet, goes silent and Sam Grobart offers five tips for buying a laptop.

headline.main: TimesCast Tech: The End of Minitel
